user_query: I'm planning a family reunion and I want to organize a stock market game for some fun. Can you fetch the latest financial information for Apple stocks and provide insights into the equity ratios of Saudi Aramco? Additionally, I would like to gather some news articles about the stock market to stay updated.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest financial information for Apple stocks.
Analyze and provide insights into the equity ratios of Saudi Aramco based on the latest financial data.
Gather recent news articles about the stock market to stay updated.
